Healthcare is complex. Patient billing and payments shouldn't have to be.

A healthcare payments platform purpose-built for patients, healthcare providers, and their partners.

From online bill pay solutions to provider-facing payment integrations, the Salucro platform brings cohesive payment experiences to healthcare providers, patients, and third-party collection agencies.

Patient Payments

Better technology, happier patients: improve the online bill pay experience for your patients.

Provider Solutions

Point-of-sale and back office solutions for revenue cycle teams, boosting efficiency and patient payments.

Partners & Integrations

A flexible API and iFrame integration options built to compliment, not compete, with your current solutions.

More Payment Options, Advanced Functionality

With over 16 different payment options, including third-party financing, Salucro provides the advanced features and functionality healthcare providers need to help drive increased payment collections and improved patient financial outcomes.
